10  def exists(self, name):
11  query = 'SELECT id FROM version WHERE name = :name'
12  result = self.__dao.execute(query, {'name': name}).fetchone()
13  if result is None:
14  return False, None
15  else:
16  return True, result['id']
17 
18  def get(self, name):
19  query = 'SELECT id, name, version, version_name, update_date FROM version WHERE name=:name'
20  result = self.__dao.execute(query, {'name': name}).fetchone()
21  if result is None:
22  raise UnknownVersionException(f'"{name}" is not a valid version name')
23 
24  return result['version']
25 
26  def set(self, name, version, version_name=''):
27  query = ('UPDATE version '
28  'SET version=:version, version_name=:version_name, update_date=CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE name=:name')
29  self.__dao.execute(query, {'version': version, 'version_name': version_name, 'name': name})
